Headline: #55 Garfield and #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park Temporary Westbound Reroute near 55th/Blackstone
ShortDescription: WB 55 and 171 buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Lake Park, 53rd, Woodlawn and 55th, due to street blockage near 55th/Blackstone.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  #55 Garfield and #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Lake Park, 53rd, Woodlawn and 55th, due to street blockage near 55th/Blackstone.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute near Cicero/Madison
ShortDescription: 54 buses temp. rerouted SB: Cicero, Washington, Kilpatrick, Madison and Cicero; NB: Madison, Kenton, Washington and Cicero, near Cicero/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Cicero/Madison.

Southbound buses will operate via Cicero, Washington, Kilpatrick, Madison and Cicero.

Northbound buses will operate via Madison, Kenton, Washington and Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Loyola. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Loyola.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Jackson. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Jackson. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
